title: The Stunt man
creator_credit: Melvin Simon Productions and Richard Rush
brief_description: A mysterious fugitive escapes from the law and ends up becoming a stunt man under a mesmerizing, possibly insane movie director (Peter O’Toole). Explores the ever changing nature of reality and illusion. Cast also includes Steve Railsback, Barbara Hershey.
